test-set.name: app-Walmsley
test-set.description: XQuery 3.1 examples from Priscilla Walmsley's XQuery Book

test-case.name: d1e20420
test-case.test: xquery version "3.1" encoding "UTF-8"; "inserted for testing prolog only examples"

test-case.name: d1e40984
d1e41029
test-case.test: deep-equal(map:merge(for $p in doc("catalog.xml")//product return map:entry(string($p/number), string($p/name))), map {"557":"Fleece Pullover", "563":"Floppy Sun Hat", "443":"Deluxe Travel Bag", "784":"Cotton Dress Shirt"})

test-case.name: d1e41041
d1e41094

result.assert-xml: <product num="557" dept-name="Women's"/><product num="563" dept-name="Accessories"/><product num="443" dept-name="Accessories"/><product num="784" dept-name="Men's"/>

test-case.name: d1e41148

result.assert-xml: <product num="557" dept-name="Women's" dept-code="310"/><product num="563" dept-name="Accessories" dept-code="300"/><product num="443" dept-name="Accessories" dept-code="300"/><product num="784" dept-name="Men's" dept-code="320"/>

test-case.name: d1e41190
d1e41255

result.assert-xml: <product num="557" dept-name="Women's" dept-code="310"/><product num="563" dept-name="Accessories" dept-code="300"/><product num="443" dept-name="Accessories" dept-code="300"/><product num="784" dept-name="Men's" dept-code="320"/>

d1e41301

modified.change: Fixed typo: trailing comma in map constructor

test-case.name: d1e41517

result.assert-permutation: ("Key: ACC, value: Accessories", "Key: WMN, value: Women's", "Key: MEN, value: Men's")

result.assert-xml: 443 Deluxe Travel Bag 557 Fleece Pullover navy black 563 Floppy Sun Hat 784 Cotton Dress Shirt white gray Our favorite shirt!

test-case.name: d1e78807

modified.change: edit relative stylesheet-location, in response to bug 29582

test-case.name: d1e78807d

result.assert-xml: <map xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions"><number key="number">557</number><string key="name">Fleece Pullover</string><array key="colorChoices"><string>navy </string><string>black ERROR!!</string></array><boolean key="is-current">true</boolean><null key="other"/></map>

test-case.name: d1e78807e
test-case.test: deep-equal( parse-json(xml-to-json(<map xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions"> <number key="number">557</number> <string key="name">Fleece Pullover</string> <array key="colorChoices"> <string>navy</string> <string>black</string> </array> <boolean key="is-current">true</boolean> <null key="other"/> </map>, map{"indent":true()})) , map { "number": 557, "name": "Fleece Pullover", "colorChoices": ["navy", "black"], "is-current": true(), "other": () } )

test-case.name: d1e78807f
test-case.test: deep-equal ( parse-json('{ "number": 557, "name": "Fleece Pullover", "colorChoices": ["navy","black"], "is-current": true, "other": null }'), map { "number": xs:double(557), "name": "Fleece Pullover", "colorChoices": ["navy", "black"], "is-current": true(), "other": () })

test-case.name: d1e78807g
test-case.test: deep-equal ( parse-json('{ "number": 557, "name": "Fleece Pullover", "name": "Fleece Pullover Redux", "colorChoices": ["navy \u00E9", "black \uFFFF"], "is-current": true, "other": null }', map { "duplicates": "use-first", "validate": false(), "escape": false(), "fallback": function($s){"ERROR!!"}}), map { "number": xs:double(557), "name": "Fleece Pullover", "colorChoices": ["navy ", "black ERROR!!"], "is-current": true(), "other": () })

test-case.name: d1e78807h
test-case.test: deep-equal ( parse-json(serialize(map { "number": xs:double(557), "name": "Fleece Pullover", "colorChoices": ["navy", "black"], "is-current": true(), "other": () }, <output:serialization-parameters xmlns:output = "http://www.w3.org/2010/xslt-xquery-serialization"> <output:method value="json"/> <output:indent value="yes"/> </output:serialization-parameters>)), parse-json('{ "number": 557, "name": "Fleece Pullover", "colorChoices": ["navy", "black"], "is-current": true, "other": null }') )

d1e78807j
d1e78807k
